titleStmt.title: A tender exhortation to Friends at Bristol, to bring to remembrance how it was with them in the beginning.
titleStmt.author: Rigge, Ambrose, 1635?-1705.
Fox, George, d. 1661.

notesStmt.note: Includes postscript verse by George Fox the younger.
Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
